sourcesContent:
Du bist im Ziel

Gratuliere {{teamName}} du hast die Fotos nur um gesamt {{result}}m verfehlt.

Das sind deine Konkurenten:

{{konkurent.result}}m {{konkurent.teamName}}
import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-ziel', templateUrl: './ziel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ziel.component.css'] }) export class ZielComponent implements OnInit { @Input() result: any; @Input() teamName: any; index: number = 0; hightScores = [ { result: 10, teamName: 'Andre' }, { result: 25, teamName: 'Äxu' }, { result: 30, teamName: 'Tinu' }, ]; ngOnInit() { this.hightScores.push({teamName: this.teamName, result: this.result}); this.hightScores.sort( (a, b) => { return a.result - b.result; }) } }
